      • getFeaturesAsDetachedMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Feature> getFeaturesAsDetachedMap()
        Returns features as a detached map. I.e. modifications in returned map does not affect data in object. A new map is created for each call.

      • setFeatures
